document_data.name: Dog
document_data.mainbody:
'''Dogs''' were canines prevalent throughout [[Toril]].{{Cite web/Dogs in the Forgotten Realms}}

{{Quote|Tell me friend, do you have a dog? Truly, there can be no companion more stout or loyal! No matter the city, one thing remains constant–dogs, and their deathly fear of [[fireworks]].|A [[Wa]]nese pyrobolist}}
document_data.Description: Dogs were a race of both wild and domesticated animals that were found all over the world. They came in a variety of breeds, sizes, and appearances.
document_data.Ecology: They were extremely numerous and were domesticated for use amongst the [[humanoid]] races.

Society.Training: Some of the best-trained dogs were trained by the [[elf|elven]] [[House Korianthil]].

Other Species.[[Blink dog]]: Intelligent canines with an inherent [[teleport]]ation ability.
Other Species.[[Cooshee]]: A magical breed of hounds that were kept by [[elves]].
Other Species.[[Frenzy dog]]: The creation of an evil [[druid]]ic spell in the deep forest of [[Chondalwood]].
Other Species.[[Snake-dog]]: A cross-breed between a [[snake]] and a dog, native to the jungles of [[Chult]] and domesticated by the [[yuan-ti]].
Other Species.[[Wild Hunt hound]]: A magical breed of hounds that were native to the [[Feywild]].

document_data.Reputation: Dogs were considered special animals to many deities. Hunting dogs, in particular, were favored by [[Anhur]] and [[Marthammor Duin]]. Tiny lap dogs were considered blessed by [[Savras]]. [[Arvoreen]], the [[Red Knight]], and [[Tempus]] all preferred [[war dog]]s. Dogs with gray fur were sacred to both [[Azuth]] and [[Mask]], while black dogs were sacred to [[Bane]], brown dogs to [[Cyrrollalee]], and white to [[Deneir]]. [[Mystra]] favored dogs of all varieties, and intelligent dogs were known to live in the celestial realms of [[Nephthys]], [[Rillifane Rallathil]], and [[Sharindlar]].{{Cite web enhancement/Deity Do's and Don'ts|10-15}}
